knowledge_bases.title: CNA Course Dates in Long Island
knowledge_bases.description: Events in Garden City. This includes areas like Hempstead, Mineola, Westbury, East Garden City, Uniondale, Carle Place, New Hyde Park, Franklin Square, Garden City Park, Garden City South, Garden City Plaza, Stewart Manor, Williston Park, Floral Park, North New Hyde Park, Lakeview, South Hempstead, Malverne, Albertson, East Williston

knowledge_bases.title: CNA Student Handbook
knowledge_bases.description: This file is the CNA Student Handbook for the TIA School of Allied Health, effective January 2025. It covers general information about the school, policies, emergency procedures, nondiscrimination and equal opportunity, emergency preparedness plan, payment plans, refunds, externships, exams, and student services and support. This information can be useful for understanding school policies, emergency protocols, and available student services.
